## Documentation Issue
What documentation is missing, unclear, or incorrect?

## Location
Where is (or should be) this documentation?
- [ ] README.md
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] Code comments
- [ ] API documentation (`docs/PRD/technical/api-specifications.md`)
- [ ] Setup guide (`docs/SETUP.md`)
- [ ] Other: [please specify]

## Current State
What does the documentation currently say (if it exists)?

## Suggested Improvement
What should the documentation say instead?

## Why This Matters
Who would benefit from this documentation improvement and how?

## Additional Context
Links, screenshots, or examples that help explain the issue.

- [ ] I'm willing to write or update this documentation
